programme.title: Midway to Love
programme.desc: When the network announces that her television therapy show is changing to a tabloid shock-fest, a straight laced and caring psychologist returns to her hometown and reunites with her high school sweetheart while finally realizing that having someone to share a life with is more important than fame and the excitement of the city.

programme.title: Love, Lost & Found
programme.desc: Claire gets a surprise proposal on a mountain hike with her boyfriend Joey but when they get separated, a rancher turns Claire’s head and a park ranger makes Joey see they’re made for each other.

programme.title: Love Switch
programme.desc: On their 13th wedding anniversary, James and Michelle wake up to discover they have somehow switched bodies. Unable to switch back, they are forced to understand what the other goes through daily.

programme.title: Plus One at an Amish Wedding
programme.desc: April Monroe is a superstar doctor at a big New York hospital, who has fallen head-over-heels for charming veterinarian Jesse, and their relationship seems to be heading in the right direction except for one thing: Jesse is completely tight-lipped about his Amish family.

programme.title: Prescription For Love
programme.desc: Claire, a nurse, fights for a chance at love with a charming new doctor and for a promotion to free herself from the misery her supervisor creates. As her supervisor tries to derail Claire's chance at happiness, Claire will have to stand up for herself and go after her dreams.

programme.title: Cinderella in the Caribbean
programme.desc: Ashlyn Vanderbilt travels with her stepmother Miriam and her fiancé Bruce for their destination wedding. Although Ashlyn finds friendship and love with Bruce's son, Noah, she struggles to have her happily ever after when she discovers that her stepfamily plans to ruin Bruce.

programme.title: Hometown Remedy
programme.desc: A busy surgeon heads back home to celebrate her father becoming mayor. But after a chance encounter with the town's only doctor-and most eligible bachelor-she witnesses true compassion which might be the prescription this doctor needs.

programme.title: Midway to Love
programme.desc: When the network announces that her television therapy show is changing to a tabloid shock-fest, a straight laced and caring psychologist returns to her hometown and reunites with her high school sweetheart while finally realizing that having someone to share a life with is more important than fame and the excitement of the city.

programme.desc: On their 13th wedding anniversary, James and Michelle wake up to discover they have somehow switched bodies. Unable to switch back, they are forced to understand what the other goes through daily.

programme.title: Plus One at an Amish Wedding

programme.title: Prescription For Love
programme.desc: Claire, a nurse, fights for a chance at love with a charming new doctor and for a promotion to free herself from the misery her supervisor creates. As her supervisor tries to derail Claire's chance at happiness, Claire will have to stand up for herself and go after her dreams.

programme.title: Cinderella in the Caribbean
programme.desc: Ashlyn Vanderbilt travels with her stepmother Miriam and her fiancé Bruce for their destination wedding. Although Ashlyn finds friendship and love with Bruce's son, Noah, she struggles to have her happily ever after when she discovers that her stepfamily plans to ruin Bruce.

programme.title: Hometown Remedy
programme.desc: A busy surgeon heads back home to celebrate her father becoming mayor. But after a chance encounter with the town's only doctor-and most eligible bachelor-she witnesses true compassion which might be the prescription this doctor needs.

programme.title: Our Wild Hearts
programme.desc: Willow (Cambrie Schroder), a determined young teenager, is obsessed with the idea of meeting the father she never knew. She leaves her cushy life in Malibu to travel to the Sierra Nevada mountains, where she pays a surprise visit to Jack (Ricky Schroder), a rugged cowboy who has no idea he’s a father. As the two struggle to bond, Willow makes a connection with a wild mustang, Bravo. Jack wants to capture and tame the magnificent horse, but Willow is convinced he needs to be free. Will the wild stallion that brought them together end up tearing them apart?
